title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez | Trump Keeps Lying About the Coronavirus Outbreak: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump lying to millions of people about the coronavirus outbreak as his administration bungles its response to the crisis.

Then, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez talks about fighting the coronavirus, supporting Bernie Sanders in the 2020 election and the youth vote.

She also takes a few more questions exclusively for this podcast from Late Night's Henry Melcher and Sal Gentile.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
